mapper.select: select count(*) from (select notice.*, row_number() over(order by notice_seq desc) rn from notice)
select * from (select notice.*, row_number() over(order by notice_seq desc) rn from notice) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_view_count = notice_view_count + 1 where notice_seq = #{value}
mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where notice_title like '%'|| #{searchWord}||'%'
select m.mem_photo from member m ,(select * from notice where notice_seq = #{value}) n where m.mem_id = n.notice_writer
